channel.title: [HELP] Looking For Knowledgeable People
channel.description:
Hello, im the main owner of a very large gaming community with over 3000 followers, private game titles, private game servers, voip servers and dedicated quad core/100mbit uplink servers. We are currently expanding to runescape hosting. We want to run a server which is fun to all (just like the real runescape servers) Were looking for one with a nice large PK area/wilderness – plus nice nonpk area’s for those wishing to actually work up stats... we’re not looking to make it 1hour and your level 99. We want to have a little bit higher than normal leveling, we also want to have some nice mini games (preferably ones from RS) were looking for a few highly educated people to help get this off the ground. THIS IS NOT A Two Week Adventure, our gaming community has been online and strong since 2006. Anyone interested in working with me and our community, please reply to this posting with a little information about yourself.
-Were also looking to make this ran via web-client, not downloadable.

item.title: [HELP] Looking For Knowledgeable People
item.dc:creator: @TheJMan TheJMan
item.description:
@TheJMan wrote:

Yes - that platform looks very nice,
what were looking for is people who want to assist with this project, since im a noob to private-runescape servers.

Read full topic
